description: Oven-baked salmon fillets with lemon butter and fresh parsley, served alongside roasted baby potatoes and green beans.

imagePrompt.base: Hyper-realistic close-up of Lemon Garlic Salmon plated elegantly on a white plate. Pure white studio background, natural window lighting, shallow depth of field. Showcase vibrant colors, gentle steam, and fresh garnish that highlights texture.
imagePrompt.enhanced: Hyper-realistic, alluring close-up of a perfectly flaky Lemon Garlic Salmon fillet, glistening with lemon butter, artfully plated with golden-roasted baby potatoes and vibrant green beans on a pristine white dish. Soft, natural window light accentuates delicate steam. Garnished with fresh chopped parsley and a bright lemon wedge for inviting texture. Shallow depth of field.
